messages.message: Hi all -- removed license-service from Crafting. Please update your sandboxes from the template (`cs sandbox update` or UI)!

i ran `cs sandbox update`  the license-service container is still there, is this fine?

https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/jet
Yes, you also need to pull from master for it to completely go away.

Hey Matt, the PR to remove license service also removed a bunch of proto sentinel files which used to track the last time they were updated. After removing them, the build_protos script started throwing file not found errors when trying to build the python generated files. Assuming these files are not needed anymore, here's (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/74353) a PR to remove the logic to update sentinels completely to stop getting the error while building protos. @mfichman Can you take a look at the PR?
